name: Daylio
summary: Mood tracker and micro-diary for mental health
description: Daylio is a simple, ad-free mood tracker and diary app. Track your mood, activities, and habits without typing a single line. Identify patterns, triggers, and trends in your mental health.

sections.title: About Daylio
sections.text: Daylio is a micro-diary that doesn't require you to write long journal entries. Pick your mood and add activities you've been doing during the day. Review beautiful statistics and discover patterns in your emotional well-being.

sections.title: Key Features
sections.text:
• Quick mood logging with customizable moods
• Activity tracking to identify patterns
• Beautiful charts and statistics
• Streak tracking for motivation
• Secure PIN or fingerprint lock
• Export data to PDF or CSV
• Custom reminders
• No ads in free version

sections.title: Privacy & Security
sections.text: Daylio stores all data locally on your device. Your data is never sent to external servers without your permission. Optional cloud backup is encrypted. No account required for basic features.

sections.title: Pricing
sections.text: Free: Unlimited mood and activity tracking, basic stats. Premium ($4.99/month or $24.99/year): Advanced stats, goals, photo attachments, themes, unlimited backup.
